description: A list of components that constitute this Container Application. Components are either container-based services or other Container Applications. Components that are container-based services are specified as a collection of artifacts for providers that can accept a parameters specified by the deployer. These artifacts are references to files located in local sub-directories. Components that are other Container Applications are specified as URLs.
title: Graph

___artifacts.description: A list of ArtifactsObject that contain provider specific information. If artifacts is present, the source field SHALL be ignored.

___params.description: A list of ParamsObject that contain information to be used by providers in conjunction with their ArtifactsObject. If params is present, the source field SHALL be ignored.

___source.description: If the component is another Container Application, source MUST be a valid URL to the source location.  If source is present, all other fields SHALL be ignored.

___artifacts.description: A list of ArtifactsObject that contain provider specific information. If artifacts is present, the source field SHALL be ignored.

$eref.description: A provider is a deployment platform or orchestrator.
$eref.title: Provider

___branch.name: branch
___branch.description: The source control branch. Default value is 'master'.

___type.name: type
___type.description: The source control type. Default value is 'git'.

___source.name: source
___source.description: Source location of the source control repository. The source MUST be specified by a valid URL.

___path.name: path
___path.description: The path to a specific artifact file or directory of artifact files. Default value is '/' which would reference all of the files in the repository.

___inherit.name: inherit
___inherit.description: List of components whose artifacts will be added to the list of artifacts for the provider.

___params.description: A list of ParamsObject that contain information to be used by providers in conjunction with their ArtifactsObject. If params is present, the source field SHALL be ignored.

$eref.description: Name of the parameter as used in artifacts
$eref.title: Parameter

___description.description: A human readable description of the parameter.

___hidden.description: An optional boolean signifying the parameter should be obscured when displayed.

___default.description: An optional default value for the parameter.

___source.description: If the component is another Container Application, source MUST be a valid URL to the source location.  If source is present, all other fields SHALL be ignored.
